song.title: Lord, You Know Me
song.lyrics:
[V1] Lord, you know me, and you search the secrets of my heart. Sometimes I run and try to hide though you're here by my side. My aching heart, this weary pain, Lord, I call your holy name. You know when I sit and when I rise, tender love shining from your eyes.
[C] And you say: I know. I know. I died for you, I rose for you, my Spirit I gave to you.
[V2] Lord, you know me, and you search the secrets of my heart. Sometimes I run and try to hide though you're here by my side. You don't condemn but you guide, darkness can't hide from love divine. Oh, Spirit of power, on me descend; my sinful soul, you be friend.
[V3] Lord, you know me, and you search the secrets of my heart. Sometimes I run and try to hide though you're here by my side. Eternal life, I purely seek, Open my heart when I am weak so if my steps should go astray; lead me in your eternal way.
[V32] For I shall not be afraid, I'm wonderfully made. Wonderfully made, wonderfully made, wonderfully made am I. Wonderfully made, wonderfully made, wonderfully made am I.
[C2] 'Cause I know. I know. You died for me. You rose for me. Your Spirit sets me free.
